decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0201 Rev P05; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0203 Rev P08; 282-PE-XX-00-DR-A-2001 Rev P04; 282-PE-XX-01-DR-A-2002 Rev P05; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-8201 Rev P02; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-8101 Rev P04; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-8001 Rev P05; 282-PE0XX-ZZ-DR-A-8002 Rev P04; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-3101 Rev P06; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-1206 Rev P05; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-4101 Rev P05; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-4102 Rev P05; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-C-0500 Rev P02; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-C-0600 Rev P02; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-C-0700 Rev P02; 282-PE-XX-DR-C-0701 Rev P01; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-C-0100 Rev P01; 282-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-C-0110 Rev P02; Design and Access Statement by Pick Everard; Received: 23/10/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 4 - The premises shall be used for a music centre, educational children's provision for the under 2's and 5's and a children's centre and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 5 - Prior to the first use of the building hereby permitted, a Service and Delivery Management Plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The school shall thereafter operate in accordance with the
approved Plan.

Condition : 6 - Prior to the first use of the building hereby permitted, a Travel Plan regarding the whole of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The Plan shall  be based on agreed modal split targets and describe the means by which students, teachers, visitors and users of the development shall be encouraged to travel to the site by means other than the private car. The Plan as approved shall be monitored and reviewed on an annual basis and the measures described in the action plan shall be implemented in the time period identified.

Condition : 7 - No development shall take place, including any works of demolition, until a Construction Logistics Plan has been submitted to, and approved in writing by, the local planning authority. The approved Plan shall be adhered to throughout the construction period. The Plan shall include:
i.	a site plan
ii.	confirmation that a pre-start record of site conditions on the adjoining public highway will be undertaken with Hounslow Highways and a commitment to repair any damage caused
iii.	provision for the parking of vehicles of site operatives and visitors 
iv.	provisions for loading, unloading and storage of plant and materials within the site
v.	details of access to the site for the duration of construction including phasing arrangements 
vi.	means to control and manage access and egress of vehicles to and from the site
vii.	the erection and maintenance of security hoarding including decorative displays and facilities for public viewing, where appropriate 
viii.	provision of wheel washing facilities at the site exit and a commitment to sweep adjacent roads when required and at the request of the council
ix.	measures to control the emission of dust and dirt during construction 
x.	a scheme for recycling/disposing of waste resulting from demolition and construction works
xi.	appropriate vehicle routes to and from the site
xii.	measures to ensure the safety of all users of the public highway especially cyclists and pedestrians in the vicinity of the site and especially at the access.
description: Erection of a two storey building to provide a music centre and educational children's provision for the under 2's and 5's
